roleset.name: lend aid, credence to

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: The Dean's championship of freedom of speech on campus has become controversial.
example.arg: of freedom of speech on campus

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: His vigorous championship of the conservatives got him in trouble with progressives.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry champion.01, OntoNotes grouping champion-n sense 2; maps to VN class captain-29.8-1. Framed by Claire.

roleset.name: winning over an opponent

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: And Eagan is the only American ever to have won four all Ireland championships , for banjo , tin whistle , flute and mandolin playing .
example.arg: for banjo, tin whistle, flute and mandolin playing
example.note: arg2 is a region, but also denotes the group of people Eagon is champion over. The same would also apply to 'world', etc.

example.name: arg1 is the name of the competition/prize
example.text: He won three most valuable player awards and led the Penguins to two Stanley Cup championships in 1991 and 92 .
example.note: Try your best to distinguish between eventive championships (which should be able to take args 0 and 2), and non-eventive champtionships which refer only to specific games. Examples such as this one can be fuzzy, but you can construe this one as eventive if you add an arg2, and arg2 doesn't sound particularly strange here, at least not to my ear. "He led the Penguins to two Stanley Cup championships over the Blackhawks", as opposed to "I watched hours of the national poker championships on TV"/ *"I watched hours of his national poker championships over the other players" (you could possibly utter the latter, but it changes the meaning of 'championships', see?

example.name: with args 0 and 2
example.text: Ch. Carmel's T-lan Express "Trucker" finished his championship over an entry of 34 males at the prestigious Hatboro show.

example.name: oblique arg0
example.text: After every game Al - Hilal plays , other teams pay the price in order to unjustly and artificially increase the number of championships for this team .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on more-nouns, defeat-n.01. No VNcls.
